column5: hey guys just wondering if this charger is ok to charge my optima bluetop? https://ibb.co/bXoQmF  if not, what do you guys recommend  thanks Justin

According to the newer model of that charger from CT is says it will charge Lead Acid, AGM, and Gel Cell batteries. So I think you should be good. Or if you have a few bucks to spare just pick up and NOCO G3500 and never worry about that type of battery you are charging again.  Cheers,
